ResearchProjectDef.label: Late Medieval Hygiene

ResearchProjectDef.label: plumbing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use pipes, plumbing fixtures, storage tanks, and other apparatuses to provide heating, waste removal, and potable water.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Irrigation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build much larger water towers, and sprinklers that can irrigate soil to improve fertility.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hygiene I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Sanitation infrastructure to keep colonists clean, healthy and happy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hygiene II
ResearchProjectDef.description: This allows colonists to build electric crematoriums, which can incinerate unwanted corpses, apparel and materials faster. Also provides an ability to manufacture ceramic bathroom fixture.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hygiene III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build advanced powered toilets which use less water per flush and provide more comfort and powered showers which halves the time spent showering and improves comfort, but use twice as much water.
